what_done: Added .github/dependency-review.yml and wired dependency-review workflow config-file to enforce fail-on-severity: high.
Updated security-supply-chain workflow to run Trivy non-blocking on pull_request and blocking on schedule/workflow_dispatch.
Hardened scripts/security/artifact_guard.sh to pass cleanly when changed-file set is empty.
Appended CI-010-B hardening and verification notes to docs/audits/ci-workflows-audit.md.
what_next: Validate in PR checks that Dependency Review enforces configured policy and that Trivy findings are warn-only on pull_request.
Run workflow_dispatch for security-supply-chain to verify blocking branch fails on HIGH/CRITICAL findings.
If regressions appear, apply rollback plan by reverting supply-chain Trivy split and dependency-review config wiring.
